transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Executive: Haan bolo madam Srishti Singh from IndiaMART.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yeah so have you received any calls inquiries related to your products or not sir?
Customer: Related to I think you related to inquiry calls related to your product sir.
Executive: Actually aaj pura busy hai busy hu mai subah 10 baje se aap mere ko 4 tarikh tak phone kiya aaj bahar hu mai.
Executive: To sir kab baat ho sakti hai aapse?
Customer: Haan aur ye madam yahi number se do baar call aa gaya madam mai dekha mobile bhi off ho gaya 11:30 baje.
Executive: Kyunki sir aapne jaise kal mai bhi dekha hu ki kya ho gaya.
Customer: Okay. Mere ko sir aap mujhe ye bata dijiye kal aapne likhaya tha ki aapko baat karna hai kisi employee se IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kya hai iski price inquiry karna hai na kya hai. Wholesale me kitna aata hai manufacturer se kitna manufacturer se kitna benefit aata hai humko. To pura inquiry kar raha hu do din lagta hai madam shukrawar ko update karunga pura.
Executive: Achcha matlab aapko catalog update karwana tha right sir?
Customer: Haan catalog me price price pura kaise na madam.
Executive: Achcha matlab catalog me aapko price update karana tha.
Customer: Haan price price chhod diya sab chhod diya kya hai ki madam bola ki aapka services haan jaise aapne services li hai theek hai IndiaMART se kal theek hai to sir isme kya hai ki jo aapka catalog score hai jaise pricing wagera missing to agar wo aap update kar denge to sir jo aapko inquiries aap aayi hai ya aayengi in future calls jo aayengi wo sir relevant aayengi jaise aapke product ke according hi aayengi aisa nahi ki not relevant aa gaya theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir aap mujhe bata sakte hai koi proper date to mai aapse us din connect karu aap.
Customer: Achcha ek achcha logo bana denge ye kya hai mera staff ke staff ka naam pe aur kuch inquiry karne ka hai mai pichle 10 din se inquiry kar raha hu pura se thoda thoda thodi thodi thoda thoda kya bol raha jyada bol raha thoda log kam bol raha. Actually we are looking for the manufacturer.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: If you bring from the manufacturers we will get a good benefit na discount.
Executive: Okay. So only manufacturer.
Customer: Yes we only manufacturers in Telangana state I will tell you the exact location also Hyderabad surrounding areas like Hyderabad Nizamabad and Karimnagar. Sir you are not supply in pan India you are supplying only prefer cities just like Hyderabad Tamil Nadu in south.
Customer: No yes planning for pan India only madam.
Executive: Okay planning matlab you plan it is a pan India right?
Customer: I will say I will say one thing you are a customer. So you are looking for the you are a customer. You are looking for the you are looking for the walnuts and dry fruits and almonds and everything.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: So where should I bring from if I bring from the manufacturer I will get a good benefit in that good discount margin.
Executive: Okay. So did you receive yeah sir one more question did you receive any buyleads and did you consume and this today.
Customer: Did you receive any?
Executive: Buyleads buyleads.
Customer: Achcha buyleads kuch nahi aaya madam ye price nahi laga diya madam.
Executive: Nahi mai puch rahi hu sir buyleads consume kiya hai aapne jaise ki Telangana se aaya hai 12 ton ka.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Haan sir IndiaMART se aapko ye.
Customer: Theek hai khol diya.
Executive: Khol liya usme sir dekhiye niche option aa raha hoga buyleads.
Customer: Haan buyleads malum one second. Haan to sir usme dekhiye sabse pehle sir latest pehla option latest pehle se haan. Ji usme aa raha hai sir almond nuts Telangana se 12 ton. Idhar idhar all option bolke hai all ke all ke niche. Haan all ke niche. Almond nuts bolke hai quantity price. Haan all nuts bolke. Haan kya sir kar liya?
Customer: Haan yahi doubt mere abhi Rajkumar sir call kar diya mere ko abhi yahi doubt puchne wala hai wo un log thoda extra kharcha dal ke chal raha hai even chal raha bolke busy busy rehta hai.
Executive: Achcha wo log bol rahe hai ki abhi matlab unke yaha kuch. Haan abhi baat kar liya madam 10 minute tak baat kiya madam un logo ka kuch chal raha bolke.
Executive: Isme sir cashew nuts Hyderabad se jo aaya usse baat kiya?
Customer: No no no ye pura bazar se baat karna.
Executive: To sir dekhiye isme baat karne se pehle ye jo contact buyer now hai na uspe click kar dijiye to aapko sir buyer ke jo bhi numbers hai wo mil jayenge.
Customer: Kiya sir. Okay madam okay got it one more thing ye kya bolte hai ye verified badge ye verified seller verified buyer verified buyer bolke logo ko kaisa guarantee hai unko kaisa check karna hai kaisa check karna. Email id is human id hai whatsapp pe aur business se.
Executive: Sir dekhiye GST agar verified karna hai to sabse upar dekhiye relevant ke niche aa raha hoga lead type me GST.
Customer: Haan nahi madam mai kya bol raha hu mai aapko. Haan boliye. Isme genuine buyer bolke ek badge verified badge dete hai na seller ko har buyer ko. Nahi nahi nahi. Ye verified logo ko puchte hai un logo ko hona hai kya hona hai. Ab mai aapko ye batati hu jaise aap bol rahe hai na GST verified theek hai. Haan haan. Sir GST haan GST verified aapko sir usi jo buylead aapne khola hai cashew nuts ke niche ek aaya hai almond nuts usme dekhiye sir aa raha hai GST verified dikh raha hai aapko. Haan dikh raha hai tag aa raha hai tag aa raha hai. Ye ye cashew nuts ka nahi aa raha business whatsapp. Cashew nuts ka nahi aa raha sir uske niche aa raha hai almond nuts ka. Logo ko nahi bejna hai logo ko dekh rahe hai unko nahi bejna. Achcha jinka GST hai unko nahi bejte. Haan bas wahi na kya hai ki GST ke logo nahi hai to guarantee kya hai wo paisa dete bolke for example uska 40000 ho gaya. Isliye aap aisa bol rahe hai ki jinka GST hai mai unko hi bheju na aur jinka GST nahi hai unke sath nahi karunga right? Haan jinka GST nahi hai wo genuine verified badge badge holder nahi hai. Haan to sir dekhiye mai aapko GST verified se hi ek filter aa raha hoga sabse upar relevant ke niche theek hai. Lead type me GST uspe sir click kijiyega to aapko sirf GST ka hi jo GST verified customer hai wahi dikhenge. GST aur address GST address jarurat hai. Haan to sir jiske paas GST hai jiske paas GST hoga to unke paas to GST address bhi rahega na sir. Hmm. To aur koi concern hai haan aur koi concern hai sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: Hello aap kaha se baat kar rahe hai madam? Sir mai baat kar rahi hu Noida se Delhi. Kal kal diya mai baat karna diya yahi number se diya mai baat kar wo nahi hai jawab diya. Yes sir wo matlab yahi number se diya. Ji mai dusre team me hu mai aapki sir account manager hu. Theek hai theek hai. Mai aapki sari update dekhungi jo bhi aapko concern hoga mujhe. First account manager ji ek saal tak rehta hai abhi for one year. Yes sir. Yes sir for one year. Achcha okay. Sir aapko koi bhi concern hoga sir Srishti Singh. Okay naam? Srishti. Srishti okay okay madam. Okay aur koi concern nahi hai na sir? Nahi madam nahi kya hai ye number pe call kar sakte hai na isliye mai call kiya. Haan sir aap mujhe is number pe call mujhe message bhi kar sakte hai whatsapp pe. Ye aapka personal number nahi hai personal number nahi hai. Yes sir. Ya aapka personal number hai de do. Yes sir ye office ka number. Bolo ji bolo. No sir ye personal number hi hai matlab ispe aap kar sakte hai aap. Theek hai. Theek hai. Pura dates kya bolte hai madam wo catalog aur pura thoda thoda chote chote kam hai na. Price lagane ke liye. Haan sir aap mujhe bataye parso kab free rahenge to mai aapse connect kar pau. Kya? Sir parso aap kab free rahoge jaise. Haan free rehta hu madam. Free mere ko kam pura ho jata ye price ka kam pura kya catalog ka kam ho jata. Hone ke baad aapko confirm karunga pura. Okay. Call karke aapko address deke. Haan. Aapko address deke pura prices update karke. Okay. Hmm. Sir iske baad ek aapko mail aayega theek hai registered mail pe to uspe sir satisfied click kar dijiyega theek hai. Theek hai. Shukriya. Okay. Thank you so much. Thank you Srishti Singh madam. Happy to use you. Good day sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update catalog price.

- Wants to connect with manufacturer.

- Wants to know about verified badge.

- Wants to see GST verified customers only.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about catalog score.

- Executive explained about GST verified filter.

- Executive informed about account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after two days.

- Customer will update the catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, gst, buyleads, verified badge
